name: Mosey
description:
Controls: 

A or Left Arrow -Left
D or Right Arrow- Right
Space -Jump 

There are only three levels so on the third level once you reach the "goal" nothing will happen. 

This prototype was made in 1 week for the "My First Game Jam: Winter 2021" and while it is the bare bones of a prototype I wanted to share my progress with other jammers. 

As this was my first attempt at making a game (after spending about two months learning how to code and navigate unity) there wasn't a whole lot of planning involved because I simply wanted to see what I could achieve in one week in terms of development. This was an incredible learning experience in terms of realizing about every little component is needed to make a game come to life. 

I see this project as one that can be pursued further so feedback is much appreciated. 

There were objectives that were not completed in this prototype, such as: a start screen, particle effects, background assets, and making the  signs something you can actually read. If this project does get pursued further, I am interested in turning it into a narrative platformer with npcs, more levels, and different environments. 

Programming and assets by Ameerah Bader
Sounds & Music by Sergio Gonzalez
